sbrid = #{sbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sjmc = #{sjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update jf_shenbao set sbrid = #{sbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjmc = #{sjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jflxid = #{jflxid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fz = #{fz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sjms = #{sjms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fj = #{fj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sbsj = #{sbsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jdms = #{jdms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}ï¼Œ dqjd = #{dqjd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spjlid = #{spjlid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dqjdsj = #{dqjdsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select sb.id,sbrid, type, sjmc, jflxid, sb.fz, sjms, fj, sbsj, status ,xm.jfxmc from jf_shenbao sb left join jf_shenbao_xm xm on xm.id = sb.jflxid
and sbrid = #{sbr}
and sjmc like concat('%',#{sjmc},'%')
and jfxmc like concat('%',#{jfxmc},'%')
select u.userid,u.realname as uname,u.departmentid as dname,u.dutyid as zw from sys_user u where u.userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
